title: Did President Trump say if the soldiers were "real patriots," they wouldn't get an increase in wages?
subtitle: When Trump talked to the U.S. forces about the next increase in military wages, he was joking that he knew they didn't really want an increase because they were "very patriotic."
author: David Emery
vclaim: President Trump said in his address to the U.S. military that if the soldiers were real patriots, they would not receive an increase in pay.
